title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, but they do not have any effect. This can be misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect on the image.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled and not allow any movement when opened.
SR:
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved.
3. Attempt to scroll using the scrollbars and observe that they do not have any effect on the displayed image.
